I really like this game. For an older game and a valve game, I am pretty happy valve has not ruined it yet. I really like the weapons, and the effects for the weapons. Sometimes it is harder to hit people becase of the way the older games were designed to shoot, but it is not a problem. I also think it is fun to shoot the radio playing italian music, and the effect it makes as it explodes. 7/10
